Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Fabulous. Fantastic dining experience, excellent service and exquisite food and presentation. Highly informative, interactive and entertaining. Thoroughly enjoyed everything and wonderful idea for a special celebration. Ordered the seasonal set menu. Highly recommended.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: I love this restaurant, amazing , brilliant, amazing wine and food, the chef KOTA, best chef amazing, arigato Kota , we love youüòò‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Wonderful experience. Very professional chefs, even their name is engraved in the knives they use! My sister doesn‚Äôt like fish so she got a menu with meat and I got the vegetarian menu which definitely felt as if I didn‚Äôt have to miss out on anything. Super tasty and the whole atmosphere is very serene and relaxing.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Hands down - the best Tepanyaki experience I had in Europe so far! The ingredients are of the highest quality standard. Beef from the US or Japan (very tasty waguy class 5 quality), excellent sea food and top of the line vegetarian options. ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: An experience worth remembering! We went here for my wife‚Äôs birthday and it was one of the best restaurant experiences we‚Äôve had so far. Japanese hospitality combined with a tasty menu that is brought to life right in front of your eyes.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: In my view the best teppan restaurant in the Netherlands. The Seasonal menu always has creative dishes as a companion to the beef main course. Fresh, highest quality ingredients and the Japanese chef at your table make a fabulously tasting ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: This is an excellent teppanyaki restaurant with beautiful food cooked right in front of you. The staff are very friendly and the chefs explain everything very well so you know exactly what you are eating which really adds to the experience. A thoroughly enjoyable place to visit with delicious food, well worth the price!!

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Good food, excellent service but the restaurant need to be refreshed because it looks old. The matching wine arrangement for 95‚Ç¨ we found wasn‚Äôt worth it, better order a good bottle of wine.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Sazanka is an amazing Japanese restaurant with western touching. The staff is incredibly good, the food is delicious, the selection of sake (warm/cold/sparkling) is wide. A chef explained what he was cooking, a sommelier remembered all my ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Wow!  We had an anniversary dinner here. Excellent experience and food. The service, attention to detail, quality of dishes is superb. Pricey, but worth it!

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: This place is just wonderful, service is excellent and food is prepared to detail. Worth a visit if into a variety of food and up for new tastes. Atmosphere is pleasant and relaxed.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text:
We were lucky to 'compare' Ciel Bleu and Sazanka.
Visited Ciel Bleu 2 days earlier, both are üëçüëå
Sazanka was an absolute fantastic experience. ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: One of the best teppanyaki restaurants I ever ate at. The classic menu was just perfect and delicious. Of course the prices are high but it‚Äôs totally worth it. The staff were really kind and fun to chat with as well.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Sazanka - great experience of teppanyaki in Amsterdam. Nice & friendly stuff. As it often is with Japanese cuisine, the taste mainly comes from high quality ingredients and not their sauces, so don‚Äôt expect something mind blowing. ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Top class. We enjoyed watching the cooks perform their work in style. Food is excellent.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Incredible restaurant ! Nice experience, with great meals, great wine, many surprise and discovery. Price is high, but I do not regret. Highly recommended.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text:
Best experience ever!
Amazing staff, very friendly and professional.
The food was outstanding and I will definitely return.
Thank you!

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Wonderful service, amazing food. Not a let down in any way! But pricey but other than that, no complaints whatsoever

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: An amazing culinary experience. Excellent food and high class service!

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Amazing food and a show,  but with these prices it's only fit for very special occasions.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: It was a fabulous experience, not only a dinner.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: We both like to go to fine dining restaurants and we were not disappointed here. We had the tasting menu with accompanying wine and both were excellent.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Such a wonderful experience! Delicious food, very kind staff, beautiful location. Highly recommend at least once in a lifetime.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: The food and service are both 5 stars

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text:
My favorite restaurant in Amsterdam. I always have a great time here, the staff will make sure of that.
I enjoy every item on the menu and I wish I could eat there every day. It‚Äôs ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Top notch dining experience at the only Michelin-started teppanyaki restaurant in Europe. Beautiful food, creatively and freshly prepared in front of diners, attentive service and flexible with dietary limitations. Extensive sake menu. Pricey, but in tune with the experience. Only gripe is that the dining room could be cooler.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: What an experience this is!!! The whole Teppanyaki experience is amazing here. Service is good (though not perfect), but the awesomeness is the amazing Japanese chef cooking everything in front of you. The result was more than perfect in serving and tasting! It's quite expensive, but really worth it for a special occasion.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: We have been there twice and have enjoyed  it every time. The service is friendly and attentive, the quality of the products and the cooking are really good and delicious. You only have to know that you not only pay a dinner but an event. We felt welcomed and good as guests.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: We enjoyed the atmosphere and the quality of the food. The wine composition was very good and matched with the food. We eolill come again during our next Amsterdam visit.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: We had a great evening, the food was really excellent (classic Menu), and the atmosphere was really nice, with the Japanese chef cooking in front of you. Service was really good, wine pairing could have been a bit better, and the dessert ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: We had lunch here as the kickoff to a bachelor party (yes we're all forty somethings and well behaved ;) ). The seasonal menu was absolutely delicious. Nice portions and well seasoned. Nice combinations of flavours. Well priced at EUR50 for ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: We had the seasonal menu and it was absolutely top notch. My girlfriend has a lactose allergy which was perfectly accommodated for. Every single course was delicious. We will certainly be back!

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: I managed my reservation by email from Italy asking if it was possible to have a personalized dessert for my anniversary, everything was done without any problem by a highly competent and friendly staff. the restaurant is magical and the teppanyaki experience is truly unique, especially with a Michelin-starred chef.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: A true teppanyaki experience all the way from start to end. The welcome and service is excellent and so is everything else. ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Amazing place, every trip to Amsterdam has to be followed up with a trip to Sazanka. Best Japanese food I've ever been served in my life, very good price considering the effort that goes into cooking the food. The waiting staff are second ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Booked a table for 10 people, paid ¬£2,000 GBP / ‚Ç¨2,500 Euro. This included wine on entry and in-between courses on the tasting menu. When leaving a bill for ‚Ç¨1,270 euro was presented. The wine waiter unknown to myself was topping up glasses ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: First of all, you must understand the settings of Sazanka: in Amsterdam, there are extremely few good restaurants. Having lived here for a year and eating out at many dozens of places, I really feel that restaurants in Amsterdam are very ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Very good food. I went there without a reservation and the staff was very friendly and allowed me and my friend to come in and eat. The preparation and presentation was outstanding to see. I highly recommend this Sazanka

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: I must admit I disliked that my boyfriend chose teppanyaki restaurant for his birthday dinner. I hated the fact actually and tried to persuade him to change it to Ciel Blue or anything else. But he lets me choose restaurants everyday so I ‚Ä¶

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: My friend and I pretty much did a three course meal here and it was one hell of a three course meal. We started our with Greetje's Big Beginning which included all 6 of their starters including Roulade of Spring Chicken, Pickled and Smoked Sea Bream Fillet, Mousse of Dutch Lady Blue Cheese,

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Certainly not the cheapest place in Amsterdam but it's very much worth the money. The food is excellent and the service extremely good. If you love great food, be sure to treat yourself to a fabulous dinner here at least once. It will be an evening to remember with zero chance to be disappointed!

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Great staff, good floormanager. Food with tender love and care.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: 1 of the best in Amsterdam! Must try!

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Our chef, Kota, and waitress, Shereen, were great! Food was delicious and they went the extra mile by surprising me with a dessert and birthday greeting!

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: There is little I can say that would do justice to the dining experience at Sazanka. It is, quite simply, magnificent. A word of advice, take the wine menu. The sommeliers are proficient beyond my ken.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: The use of top quality ingredients and the show put on by the master-chefs will leave you speechless. The social setup of the restaurant makes you feel the truly authentic Japanese hospitality.

Review Text: So f*ckong good!

Review Text: This is were you wanna go for Teppanyaki in Amsterdam.

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Great food here, great advice on drinks, wonderful environment to have a fantastic dinner. We enjoyed it very much!

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: Amazing teppanyaki experience, well deserving the michelin star! And the price is relatively high but in line with what you would expect at a michelin starred restaurant!

Name: Teppanyaki Restaurant Sazanka
Review Text: My very first time this kind of japanese food.I think that this place earned the only Michelin Star in Europe for teppanyaki style food.Everything was excellent from start to finish,expensive but worth for sure.I will be back next time I go Amsterdam.
